framework.title: Sample Framework
framework.description: This is a sample framework for demonstration purposes

policies.title: Information Security Policy
policies.description: This policy outlines information security requirements
policies.objective: To establish guidelines for protecting information assets
policies.scope: Applies to all employees and information systems

policies.title: Access Control Policy
policies.description: This policy defines access control requirements
policies.objective: To ensure appropriate access to information resources
policies.scope: Applies to all access to information systems
